response.overview: "Good Boy" is a youth action drama about Yoon Dong-joo, a former Olympic gold medalist in boxing who joins a special police unit made up of retired athletes called the “Olympics Avengers.” Once national heroes, these ex-athletes now use their physical strength and unique sports skills to fight crime and uphold justice in ways ordinary officers cannot. As they take on dangerous missions and adapt to their new roles, they face both personal struggles and the challenge of redefining their purpose in a society that has moved on from their glory days.
response.title: Good Boy
